40b93ab8-5c1a-4ad5-ac6f-a143092b6746 }}__NOTOC__ '''Vela''' is a [Glanfathan](/glanfathan/) in {{poe1}} and {{poe2}}. She can be found in the Glanfathan home in the [Hearthsong](/hearthsong/) district of [Twin Elms](/twinElms/). If you keep her during [Sacrificial Bloodlines](/sacrificialBloodlines/), she will appear in {{poe2}}, as a [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) aboard ''[The Defiant](/theDefiant/)''. ## Background Vela is is the child of [Widhwn](/widhwn/), a [Glanfathan](/glanfathan/) anamfath. Though unusually calm and quiet for a baby, this is a healthy infant that has managed to avoid the effects of Waidwen's Legacy. The innocent wee babe is the target of a scheme by [Simoc](/simoc/) to sacrifice her and strengthen his seed, to sire an heir worthy of the Three-Tusk Stelgaer. ## Interactions ## ={{poe1}} = {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Sacrificial Bloodlines](/sacrificialBloodlines/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Sacrificial Bloodlines](/sacrificialBloodlines/): Simoc desires to murder Vela, while his son wants to see his father stopped before this madness comes to pass. The little Vela is represented by a special quest item, simply called [baby](/baby/). ## ={{poe2}} = Vela is present as part of the crew, but only available if you kept her during [Sacrificial Bloodlines](/sacrificialBloodlines/). She is first seen accompanying [Eld Engrim](/eldEngrim/) in [Vilario's Rest](/vilariosRest/). While no significant dialogue is added (other than some chatter with your companions), Vela can be seen as the [Watcher](/watcher/)'s version of an adoptive daughter. {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |other = * Vela has a number of heartwarming lines of dialogue for each companion.[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jx9S_-NgUvw ''Vela & Companions''] - DanaDuchy on YouTube * For the [Magran's Fires](/magransFires/) challenge "Hylea's Challenge", Vela follows the Watcher, and has to be kept alive or the game ends. |crew = {{crewrank|0}} }} ## Gallery Portrait Vella Convo.png | Vela's conversation portrait Portrait Vela Sm.png | Vela's crew member portrait PE2 Vela.png | Vela's in-game model {{references}}
